::Prowl::

Prowl frowned, recieving the thoughts from Iron Raptor. He didn't 
think that they had gone too fast, but then again, he was male. Yet, 
he thought that they had gone at good pace back then. Any couple that 
was in love as much as him and Iron Raptor could pick their own pace. 
Heck, anyone could pick their pace.

Prowl slightly smiled again, remembering things that would not be 
appropriate to display in this post. But then he sighs. He saw little 
point to going slow. In a war like this there was always a chance that 
either of them could end up dead the next day, and they would simply 
lose out on what they could have done. But if one of them died, so 
would the other. That was how the Matrix had brought them back, and 
that was why they could hear each other's thoughts. In alot of ways, 
they shared their thoughts and feelings.

-You don't think we should have done what we did back at the Ark?- He 
thought to her. It wasn't a regretful question, but a curious one. 
Iron Raptor was entitled to her thoughts, but Prowl wanted to know why 
she thought that they should go slow.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> * Iron Raptor continued to walk along with Prowl, still holding the 
small 
> kitten to her chest.
> She cought the stray thoughts from Prowl about the time that they 
had spent 
> in her quarters, remembering it also but not thinking of it as such 
a big 
> deal.
> She felt a strain of regret as well just then.
> She actually wished that what had happened in that room would have 
never 
> happened at that time, that things had gone too fast and they were 
just 
> acting on their sparks and not their brains.
> But it wasn't like anything too much really had happened, the battle 
had 
> called before they could really get into it.
> But now she had her mind in the right place and did regret letting 
their 
> relationship go too fast, remembering now to go slower so that there 
would 
> be no more regrets.
> Besides, they haven't even had a first date yet.
> Iron Raptor sighed and looked down at the small kitten, not seeing 
Prowl 
> smile at her.*
> 
> < I'll hear it later.>
> 
> *************************************************  ^..^
> 
> * Iris looked over the battle fieled before turning and heading in 
towards 
> the CF, glancing up and seeing Prowl with Iron Raptor.
> It was hard to explain but she knew that those two weren't in for 
the best 
> of times and would be tested beyone imagination.
> Iris crossed her arms, her face hidden behind her helm.
> She hadn't been left active to just watch them, but she would let 
them be 
> for now.
> If only they knew....*
> 
>
